Test Name: USP6 (17p13) FISH analysis for aneurysmal bone cyst and nodular fasciitis
Purpose: To detect USP6 (17p13) gene rearrangements in tissue samples to aid in the diagnosis of aneurysmal bone cyst and nodular fasciitis.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope, hybridization oven, USP6 (17p13) FISH probes
